title: can they or will they ever unban every perma acc for everyone so we can get are rank or rp back ?
body: I would love my main back couse I have at least $300 worth rp I would love to play with but its perma beucse friends trolled it would be sick to have everyones perma banned accs back?

replies.body:
Accounts are perma banned for a reason, no matter what you say they won't give it back. Even if you claim it was not your fault, they won't care.

By saying your friends trolled and forced your ban, it must have been a lot of trolling to go from the 1 day to perma ban status.

It's really unfortunate that you got banned that way. **Riot** usually doesn't reverse permabans, but $300 is a lot of money, so it might be worth to give it a shot anyway.

The best way to contact **Riot** about issues like this, is with a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Be respectful (they are just trying to help), explain your situation thoroughly and provide all the evidence you can.

Good luck!
Send a support ticket to riot.
